title: Hyderabad income tax raids uncover kickbacks in loan sales practices
description: Income tax raids on a direct selling agent for loans in Hyderabad have uncovered suspected kickbacks to bank and company executives. The agent, earning Rs 1,000 crore annually, showed unusually high expenses to reduce tax liability. Authorities are investigating similar practices in credit card acquisition and insurance sectors.
